name: CSSE1001 Tutor
subtitle: University of Queensland, July 2015 to Present
description:
Teach introduction to Python to first year students. Roles include preparing class material and assisting students with coding problems.

I also perform code reviews on student code to identify errors and provide feedback to the students

Experience writing unit tests in Python for automated marking of assignments

Show students good practises, such as abstraction, code duplication, refactoring and unit testing

name: Student Web Developer
subtitle: eLIPSE, November 2015 to Present
description:
Develop web based eLearning tools for use in courses taught at the University of Queensland

Part of the team nominated for the professional staff excellence team award in the category of innovation and exceptional performance in 2016

Worked on a variety of projects ranging from 3D visualization tools to real time assessment systems which scale to 1200 simultaneous users

Worked with project management software, such as JIRA and Confluence, and agile development methods in small teams to create applications

Part of the team which implemented an advanced permission and authentication system that models the hierarchy for courses and academics at the University of Queensland
